summary: This mod is a re-texture of the thieves guild armor to a black leather appearance.
descriptionHtml: this is my first mod, and is a re-texture of the thieves guild armor and all variations of it present in the game to a uniform black leather look. i felt that the light/dark brown leather look was not fitting with the stealthy nature of the thieves guild as a whole. this file work for both the female and male characters, and replaces every texture for the guild armor.
author: Bloodmane1
